# Acos
<!-- This file was generated - DO NOT CHANGE IT MANUALLY -->



Excel ACOS(number): Returns the inverse cosine of the given number in radians.

## Parameter

### Function name

The name of the Excel function

- ID: `functionName`
- Datatype: `string`
- Default Value: `ACOS`





## Advanced Parameter

`None`
